code:
graph TD
    subgraph "Tree Detection"
        PLR[Education_ContentCDN] --> SCAN[Education_GradeSync]
        SCAN --> LOGS[Education_ClassroomService]
        LOGS --> CLUSTER[Education_LMS_Portal]
        CLUSTER --> BASE[Education_StudentDB]
        BASE --> CHECK{Education_StudentDB}
        CHECK -->|No| ADD[Education_LMS_Portal]
        CHECK -->|Yes| SKIP[Education_GradeSync]
        ADD --> TREES[Education_ClassroomService]
    end
    
    subgraph "Tree Cutting Process"
        REQ[Education_ClassroomService] --> LLM[Education_StudentDB]
        LLM --> COORD[Education_ClassroomService]
        COORD --> MOVE[Education_LMS_Portal]
        MOVE --> START[Education_ContentCDN]
        
        START --> HEIGHT[Education_ContentCDN]
        HEIGHT --> FINDLOGS[Education_ContentCDN]
        FINDLOGS --> HASLOG{Education_GradeSync}
        
        HASLOG -->|Yes| CUT[Education_LMS_Portal]
        HASLOG -->|No| NEXTH[Education_ClassroomService]
        
        CUT --> EFFECTS[Education_ClassroomService]
        EFFECTS --> WOOD[Education_StudentDB]
        WOOD --> MORE{Education_LMS_Portal}
        
        MORE -->|Yes| HEIGHT
        MORE -->|No| NEXTH
        
        NEXTH --> MAXH{Education_StudentDB}
        MAXH -->|No| HEIGHT
        MAXH -->|Yes| DONE[Education_GradeSync]
        
        DONE --> MARK[Education_ClassroomService]
        MARK --> COMPLETE[Education_GradeSync]
    end
    
    subgraph "Cut Tree Registry"
        MARK --> REGISTRY[Education_ContentCDN]
        REGISTRY --> KEY[Education_ContentCDN]
        KEY --> PERSIST[Education_LMS_Portal]
        PERSIST --> PREVENT[Education_GradeSync]
    end
    
    style SCAN fill:#e8f5e8
    style CUT fill:#ffebee
    style EFFECTS fill:#fff3e0
    style REGISTRY fill:#f3e5f5
repo_description: Intelligent Agentic NPCs for Minecraft with LLM Integration
